creator: Global Travel Connection Apps OÜ
descriptionHtml:
Meet local people around the world, and discover local cultures without any limits!

Loka.World is a global community that allows you to meet and chat with people from all over the world before traveling to a new destination.

Get to know everything about local traditions, nightlife, gastronomy, and much more before even arriving.

5 Reasons to download the Loka.World app:

1. Get to know local people from other countries before traveling
2. Practice languages by chatting with native speakers
3. Discover the best places to visit before arriving to a new destination
4. Make new friends online all over the world
5. Share your local culture with the community

Explore local experiences in 50+ cities around the world

From home dinners to pop-up events, you can fit right in anywhere you go.

United Kingdom: London
Spain: Madrid, Barcelona
France: Paris, Nice
Germany: Frankfurt, Berlin
Italy: Rome, Milan
Turkey: Istanbul
United Arab Emirates: Dubai
United States of America: New York, Miami, Los Angeles

How to use the Loka.World app?

- Download the Loka.World app on your smartphone
- Add your city and country
- Specify your main interests
- Upload your best photos with recognizable backgrounds of your city
- Choose your native language
- Select the countries you want to know more about

Now you are free to discover our global community and its cultures. Find new friends by selecting users whose content you find interesting!

Welcome to a fascinating world of living stories from local insiders who are happy to share their culture with you!

Find your local best friend

Arriving at a new destination is exciting, but can also be very tricky if you don’t know where to go, what to do, and how to behave. Thanks to Loka.World you no longer have any limits when it comes to blending in like a real native.

Become a local insider

Introduce your city in the best way possible, and share your insights with the Loka.World community. Let people know what events are on, where to eat, where to party, and how to experience your city like a true local.

Benefits for locals

Share tips about your city
Add photos to your profile
Add languages to your profile*
Introduce yourself and make new friends
Offers local tours and experiences to fellow members

Benefits for travelers

Discover other members in a new destination
Add photos to your profile
Add languages to your profile*
Introduce yourself and make new friends
Find local friends according to interests, languages, and more

*Communicate with other Loka members without any limits using our built-in automatic translator.

What else can you do with Loka.World?

1. Like the best photos to endorse other Loka users
2. Add interesting profiles to your list of favorites to keep up with their updates
3. Communicate with other users who are interested in talking with you
4. Keep your account active to avoid losing it due to inactivity
5. Respond promptly and users will quickly react to your messages too

User protection

Nudity, profanity and indecent behaviour is strictly prohibited in our community. Loka.World users can report any bad behaviour at all times by contacting us at support@corp.loka.world

Join Loka.World and discover the world like a local

Loka provides users with the unique opportunity to learn about new cultures and attractions from real local people from the comfort of their smartphone.

Loka is free to download. If you want to get the most from the app, you can subscribe to our optional monthly subscription product LOKA Premium.

Your personal data is securely stored - be sure to read our privacy policy and terms and conditions:
https://loka.world/policy
https://loka.world/terms

The end result and user experience are important to us, so internal currency is debited only for reading answers.

Download the Loka.World app and start exploring new cultures with locals today!

container.value: Estonia, Harju maakond, Tallinn, Lasnamäe linnaosa, Punane tn 6-219, 13619

creator: Global Travel Connection Apps OÜ
descriptionHtml:
Meet local people around the world, and discover local cultures without any limits!

Loka.World is a global community that allows you to meet and chat with people from all over the world before traveling to a new destination.

Get to know everything about local traditions, nightlife, gastronomy, and much more before even arriving.

5 Reasons to download the Loka.World app:

1. Get to know local people from other countries before traveling
2. Practice languages by chatting with native speakers
3. Discover the best places to visit before arriving to a new destination
4. Make new friends online all over the world
5. Share your local culture with the community

Explore local experiences in 50+ cities around the world

From home dinners to pop-up events, you can fit right in anywhere you go.

United Kingdom: London
Spain: Madrid, Barcelona
France: Paris, Nice
Germany: Frankfurt, Berlin
Italy: Rome, Milan
Turkey: Istanbul
United Arab Emirates: Dubai
United States of America: New York, Miami, Los Angeles

How to use the Loka.World app?

- Download the Loka.World app on your smartphone
- Add your city and country
- Specify your main interests
- Upload your best photos with recognizable backgrounds of your city
- Choose your native language
- Select the countries you want to know more about

Now you are free to discover our global community and its cultures. Find new friends by selecting users whose content you find interesting!

Welcome to a fascinating world of living stories from local insiders who are happy to share their culture with you!

Find your local best friend

Arriving at a new destination is exciting, but can also be very tricky if you don’t know where to go, what to do, and how to behave. Thanks to Loka.World you no longer have any limits when it comes to blending in like a real native.

Become a local insider

Introduce your city in the best way possible, and share your insights with the Loka.World community. Let people know what events are on, where to eat, where to party, and how to experience your city like a true local.

Benefits for locals

Share tips about your city
Add photos to your profile
Add languages to your profile*
Introduce yourself and make new friends
Offers local tours and experiences to fellow members

Benefits for travelers

Discover other members in a new destination
Add photos to your profile
Add languages to your profile*
Introduce yourself and make new friends
Find local friends according to interests, languages, and more

*Communicate with other Loka members without any limits using our built-in automatic translator.

What else can you do with Loka.World?

1. Like the best photos to endorse other Loka users
2. Add interesting profiles to your list of favorites to keep up with their updates
3. Communicate with other users who are interested in talking with you
4. Keep your account active to avoid losing it due to inactivity
5. Respond promptly and users will quickly react to your messages too

User protection

Nudity, profanity and indecent behaviour is strictly prohibited in our community. Loka.World users can report any bad behaviour at all times by contacting us at support@corp.loka.world

Join Loka.World and discover the world like a local

Loka provides users with the unique opportunity to learn about new cultures and attractions from real local people from the comfort of their smartphone.

Loka is free to download. If you want to get the most from the app, you can subscribe to our optional monthly subscription product LOKA Premium.

Your personal data is securely stored - be sure to read our privacy policy and terms and conditions:
https://loka.world/policy
https://loka.world/terms

The end result and user experience are important to us, so internal currency is debited only for reading answers.

Download the Loka.World app and start exploring new cultures with locals today!
descriptionShort: Thousands of people want to meet you and see your country! Download the app now!

creator: Global Travel Connection Apps OÜ
descriptionHtml:
Meet local people around the world, and discover local cultures without any limits!

Loka.World is a global community that allows you to meet and chat with people from all over the world before traveling to a new destination.

Get to know everything about local traditions, nightlife, gastronomy, and much more before even arriving.

5 Reasons to download the Loka.World app:

1. Get to know local people from other countries before traveling
2. Practice languages by chatting with native speakers
3. Discover the best places to visit before arriving to a new destination
4. Make new friends online all over the world
5. Share your local culture with the community

Explore local experiences in 50+ cities around the world

From home dinners to pop-up events, you can fit right in anywhere you go.

United Kingdom: London
Spain: Madrid, Barcelona
France: Paris, Nice
Germany: Frankfurt, Berlin
Italy: Rome, Milan
Turkey: Istanbul
United Arab Emirates: Dubai
United States of America: New York, Miami, Los Angeles

How to use the Loka.World app?

- Download the Loka.World app on your smartphone
- Add your city and country
- Specify your main interests
- Upload your best photos with recognizable backgrounds of your city
- Choose your native language
- Select the countries you want to know more about

Now you are free to discover our global community and its cultures. Find new friends by selecting users whose content you find interesting!

Welcome to a fascinating world of living stories from local insiders who are happy to share their culture with you!

Find your local best friend

Arriving at a new destination is exciting, but can also be very tricky if you don’t know where to go, what to do, and how to behave. Thanks to Loka.World you no longer have any limits when it comes to blending in like a real native.

Become a local insider

Introduce your city in the best way possible, and share your insights with the Loka.World community. Let people know what events are on, where to eat, where to party, and how to experience your city like a true local.

Benefits for locals

Share tips about your city
Add photos to your profile
Add languages to your profile*
Introduce yourself and make new friends
Offers local tours and experiences to fellow members

Benefits for travelers

Discover other members in a new destination
Add photos to your profile
Add languages to your profile*
Introduce yourself and make new friends
Find local friends according to interests, languages, and more

*Communicate with other Loka members without any limits using our built-in automatic translator.

What else can you do with Loka.World?

1. Like the best photos to endorse other Loka users
2. Add interesting profiles to your list of favorites to keep up with their updates
3. Communicate with other users who are interested in talking with you
4. Keep your account active to avoid losing it due to inactivity
5. Respond promptly and users will quickly react to your messages too

User protection

Nudity, profanity and indecent behaviour is strictly prohibited in our community. Loka.World users can report any bad behaviour at all times by contacting us at support@corp.loka.world

Join Loka.World and discover the world like a local

Loka provides users with the unique opportunity to learn about new cultures and attractions from real local people from the comfort of their smartphone.

Loka is free to download. If you want to get the most from the app, you can subscribe to our optional monthly subscription product LOKA Premium.

Your personal data is securely stored - be sure to read our privacy policy and terms and conditions:
https://loka.world/policy
https://loka.world/terms

The end result and user experience are important to us, so internal currency is debited only for reading answers.

Download the Loka.World app and start exploring new cultures with locals today!
descriptionShort: Thousands of people want to meet you and see your country! Download the app now!

appDetails.developerAddress: Estonia, Harju maakond, Tallinn, Lasnamäe linnaosa, Punane tn 6-219, 13619
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Welcome to Loka!

Chat in the app with millions of users around the world.
Translate their messages to you native language!
Get free welcome coins!
Sign in easily with Google or Facebook and have fun!

Please send your feedback to support@corp.loka.world

We will respond immediately!

title: Loka World app - Chat and meet new people

container.value: Estonia, Harju maakond, Tallinn, Lasnamäe linnaosa, Punane tn 6-219, 13619

creator: Global Travel Connection Apps OÜ
descriptionHtml:
Meet local people around the world, and discover local cultures without any limits!

Loka.World is a global community that allows you to meet and chat with people from all over the world before traveling to a new destination.

Get to know everything about local traditions, nightlife, gastronomy, and much more before even arriving.

5 Reasons to download the Loka.World app:

1. Get to know local people from other countries before traveling
2. Practice languages by chatting with native speakers
3. Discover the best places to visit before arriving to a new destination
4. Make new friends online all over the world
5. Share your local culture with the community

Explore local experiences in 50+ cities around the world

From home dinners to pop-up events, you can fit right in anywhere you go.

United Kingdom: London
Spain: Madrid, Barcelona
France: Paris, Nice
Germany: Frankfurt, Berlin
Italy: Rome, Milan
Turkey: Istanbul
United Arab Emirates: Dubai
United States of America: New York, Miami, Los Angeles

How to use the Loka.World app?

- Download the Loka.World app on your smartphone
- Add your city and country
- Specify your main interests
- Upload your best photos with recognizable backgrounds of your city
- Choose your native language
- Select the countries you want to know more about

Now you are free to discover our global community and its cultures. Find new friends by selecting users whose content you find interesting!

Welcome to a fascinating world of living stories from local insiders who are happy to share their culture with you!

Find your local best friend

Arriving at a new destination is exciting, but can also be very tricky if you don’t know where to go, what to do, and how to behave. Thanks to Loka.World you no longer have any limits when it comes to blending in like a real native.

Become a local insider

Introduce your city in the best way possible, and share your insights with the Loka.World community. Let people know what events are on, where to eat, where to party, and how to experience your city like a true local.

Benefits for locals

Share tips about your city
Add photos to your profile
Add languages to your profile*
Introduce yourself and make new friends
Offers local tours and experiences to fellow members

Benefits for travelers

Discover other members in a new destination
Add photos to your profile
Add languages to your profile*
Introduce yourself and make new friends
Find local friends according to interests, languages, and more

*Communicate with other Loka members without any limits using our built-in automatic translator.

What else can you do with Loka.World?

1. Like the best photos to endorse other Loka users
2. Add interesting profiles to your list of favorites to keep up with their updates
3. Communicate with other users who are interested in talking with you
4. Keep your account active to avoid losing it due to inactivity
5. Respond promptly and users will quickly react to your messages too

User protection

Nudity, profanity and indecent behaviour is strictly prohibited in our community. Loka.World users can report any bad behaviour at all times by contacting us at support@corp.loka.world

Join Loka.World and discover the world like a local

Loka provides users with the unique opportunity to learn about new cultures and attractions from real local people from the comfort of their smartphone.

Loka is free to download. If you want to get the most from the app, you can subscribe to our optional monthly subscription product LOKA Premium.

Your personal data is securely stored - be sure to read our privacy policy and terms and conditions:
https://loka.world/policy
https://loka.world/terms

The end result and user experience are important to us, so internal currency is debited only for reading answers.

Download the Loka.World app and start exploring new cultures with locals today!

title: Loka World app - Chat and meet new people

container.value: Estonia, Harju maakond, Tallinn, Lasnamäe linnaosa, Punane tn 6-219, 13619

creator: Global Travel Connection Apps OÜ
descriptionHtml:
Meet local people around the world, and discover local cultures without any limits!

Loka.World is a global community that allows you to meet and chat with people from all over the world before traveling to a new destination.

Get to know everything about local traditions, nightlife, gastronomy, and much more before even arriving.

5 Reasons to download the Loka.World app:

1. Get to know local people from other countries before traveling
2. Practice languages by chatting with native speakers
3. Discover the best places to visit before arriving to a new destination
4. Make new friends online all over the world
5. Share your local culture with the community

Explore local experiences in 50+ cities around the world

From home dinners to pop-up events, you can fit right in anywhere you go.

United Kingdom: London
Spain: Madrid, Barcelona
France: Paris, Nice
Germany: Frankfurt, Berlin
Italy: Rome, Milan
Turkey: Istanbul
United Arab Emirates: Dubai
United States of America: New York, Miami, Los Angeles

How to use the Loka.World app?

- Download the Loka.World app on your smartphone
- Add your city and country
- Specify your main interests
- Upload your best photos with recognizable backgrounds of your city
- Choose your native language
- Select the countries you want to know more about

Now you are free to discover our global community and its cultures. Find new friends by selecting users whose content you find interesting!

Welcome to a fascinating world of living stories from local insiders who are happy to share their culture with you!

Find your local best friend

Arriving at a new destination is exciting, but can also be very tricky if you don’t know where to go, what to do, and how to behave. Thanks to Loka.World you no longer have any limits when it comes to blending in like a real native.

Become a local insider

Introduce your city in the best way possible, and share your insights with the Loka.World community. Let people know what events are on, where to eat, where to party, and how to experience your city like a true local.

Benefits for locals

Share tips about your city
Add photos to your profile
Add languages to your profile*
Introduce yourself and make new friends
Offers local tours and experiences to fellow members

Benefits for travelers

Discover other members in a new destination
Add photos to your profile
Add languages to your profile*
Introduce yourself and make new friends
Find local friends according to interests, languages, and more

*Communicate with other Loka members without any limits using our built-in automatic translator.

What else can you do with Loka.World?

1. Like the best photos to endorse other Loka users
2. Add interesting profiles to your list of favorites to keep up with their updates
3. Communicate with other users who are interested in talking with you
4. Keep your account active to avoid losing it due to inactivity
5. Respond promptly and users will quickly react to your messages too

User protection

Nudity, profanity and indecent behaviour is strictly prohibited in our community. Loka.World users can report any bad behaviour at all times by contacting us at support@corp.loka.world

Join Loka.World and discover the world like a local

Loka provides users with the unique opportunity to learn about new cultures and attractions from real local people from the comfort of their smartphone.

Loka is free to download. If you want to get the most from the app, you can subscribe to our optional monthly subscription product LOKA Premium.

Your personal data is securely stored - be sure to read our privacy policy and terms and conditions:
https://loka.world/policy
https://loka.world/terms

The end result and user experience are important to us, so internal currency is debited only for reading answers.

Download the Loka.World app and start exploring new cultures with locals today!

5. Share your local culture with the community

United Kingdom: London
Spain: Madrid, Barcelona
France: Paris, Nice
Germany: Frankfurt, Berlin
Italy: Rome, Milan
Turkey: Istanbul
United Arab Emirates: Dubai
United States of America: New York, Miami, Los Angeles

How to use the Loka.World app?

- Download the Loka.World app on your smartphone
- Add your city and country
- Specify your main interests
- Upload your best photos with recognizable backgrounds of your city
- Choose your native language
- Select the countries you want to know more about

Now you are free to discover our global community and its cultures. Find new friends by selecting users whose content you find interesting!

Welcome to a fascinating world of living stories from local insiders who are happy to share their culture with you!

Find your local best friend

Arriving at a new destination is exciting, but can also be very tricky if you don’t know where to go, what to do, and how to behave. Thanks to Loka.World you no longer have any limits when it comes to blending in like a real native.

Become a local insider

Introduce your city in the best way possible, and share your insights with the Loka.World community. Let people know what events are on, where to eat, where to party, and how to experience your city like a true local.

Benefits for locals

Share tips about your city
Add photos to your profile

Introduce yourself and make new friends

User protection

Nudity, profanity and indecent behaviour is strictly prohibited in our community. Loka.World users can report any bad behaviour at all times by contacting us at support@corp.loka.world

descriptionHtml:
Meet local people around the world, and discover local cultures without any limits!

Loka.World is a global community that allows you to meet and chat with people from all over the world before traveling to a new destination.

Get to know everything about local traditions, nightlife, gastronomy, and much more before even arriving.

5 Reasons to download the Loka.World app:

1. Get to know local people from other countries before traveling
2. Practice languages by chatting with native speakers
3. Discover the best places to visit before arriving to a new destination
4. Make new friends online all over the world
5. Share your local culture with the community

Explore local experiences in 50+ cities around the world

From home dinners to pop-up events, you can fit right in anywhere you go.

United Kingdom: London
Spain: Madrid, Barcelona
France: Paris, Nice
Germany: Frankfurt, Berlin
Italy: Rome, Milan
Turkey: Istanbul
United Arab Emirates: Dubai
United States of America: New York, Miami, Los Angeles

How to use the Loka.World app?

- Download the Loka.World app on your smartphone
- Add your city and country
- Specify your main interests
- Upload your best photos with recognizable backgrounds of your city
- Choose your native language
- Select the countries you want to know more about

Now you are free to discover our global community and its cultures. Find new friends by selecting users whose content you find interesting!

Welcome to a fascinating world of living stories from local insiders who are happy to share their culture with you!

Find your local best friend

Arriving at a new destination is exciting, but can also be very tricky if you don’t know where to go, what to do, and how to behave. Thanks to Loka.World you no longer have any limits when it comes to blending in like a real native.

Become a local insider

Introduce your city in the best way possible, and share your insights with the Loka.World community. Let people know what events are on, where to eat, where to party, and how to experience your city like a true local.

Benefits for locals

Share tips about your city

Introduce yourself and make new friends

3. Communicate with other users who are interested in talking with you

5. Respond promptly and users will quickly react to your messages too

User protection

Nudity, profanity and indecent behaviour is strictly prohibited in our community. Loka.World users can report any bad behaviour at all times by contacting us at support@corp.loka.world
